meanings.definition: A type of leafy green vegetable with a peppery flavor.
meanings.sent1: I added arugula to my salad for a spicy kick.
meanings.sent2: The arugula in the garden grew quickly under the sun.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous rabbit snuck into the garden and nibbled on the arugula leaves.
meanings.sent4: Her words had a sharpness to them, like the peppery taste of arugula.
meanings.sent5: The arugula danced in the wind, its leaves shimmering in the sunlight.

meanings.definition: The edible leaves of the arugula plant.
meanings.sent1: The chef carefully washed the arugula before adding it to the dish.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the fresh arugula in her sandwich.
meanings.sent3: The arugula leaves played hide and seek in the salad bowl.
meanings.sent4: His mind was as sharp and vibrant as a bed of arugula leaves.
meanings.sent5: The arugula leaves whispered secrets to the other vegetables in the fridge.
